outputs.output_descr: Development Advisory Services are intended to directly support high priority frameworks and programming initiatives. The Development Advisory Services facility is used to enhance the substantive capacity of UNDP Country Office  to respond in a timely and flexible manner to the indentified needs of governments in the respective areas. The Development Advisory Services facility also is expected to enhance the consultative process between Resident Representative  , Government and donors, especially with respect to the alignement and programming of core and non core resources.

project_descr: Development Advisory Services for direct support to upstream initiatives in UNDP's focus areas.
